label: Wood & Gel
desc: Gather wood from trees and gel from slimes.

label: Housing
desc: Build a house with at least 4 rooms.

label: Armor & Tools
desc: Hook (15 single gem + chain), full golden/platinum armor and full golden/platinum tools.

label: Farm Eye of C'thulus
desc: Get enough demonite/crimson ores to craft your next set and tools.

label: Dryad
desc: Make sure you have room for her and buy around 100 purification powder once she moves in.

label: Arena II (EoW or BoC)
desc: Above ground level if you have corruption, or an inside the ‘cave’ if you have crimson.

label: Farm EoW or BoC
desc: Get enough orbs to make a nightmare/deathbringer pickaxe and crimson/shadow set.

label: Side adventures and bosses
desc: Underground Jungle (Queen Bee), Dungeon (Skeletron), Floating Islands, Oceans.

label: Hell
desc: Get enough hellstone for a molten pickaxe and the set.

label: Arena III (Wall of Flesh)
desc: Make a really long platform made out of any block you want for The Wall of Flesh.

label: Kill the Wall of Flesh and enter in hardmode
desc: Don't forget to collect your Pwnhammer.

label: Generate ores
desc: pwn all but one demon altars with your Pwnhammer.

label: Arena IV (Harpies & Wyverns)
desc: Get enough Souls of Flights and Huge Harpy Feather for your first wing.
